title: Google\Cloud\Dialogflow\V2\CreateContextRequest
name: CreateContextRequest
description:
The request message for [Contexts.CreateContext][google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.Contexts.CreateContext].

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.CreateContextRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.parent
params.description: Required. The session to create a context for. Format: projects/<Project ID>/agent/sessions/<Session ID> or projects/<Project ID>/agent/environments/<Environment ID>/users/<User ID>/sessions/<Session ID>. If Environment ID is not specified, we assume default 'draft' environment. If User ID is not specified, we assume default '-' user.
